name.label: Full name of the person who applied

email.label: Email address
email.hint: This is where we will send our reply

application-submitted.label: Is your question about an ETA application that has been submitted?

I have not received a confirmation email.label: I have not received a confirmation email
I have not received a confirmation email.hint: Use this option if you did not get a confirmation email within 2 hours of applying

I have not received a decision.label: I have not received a decision
I have not received a decision.hint: Use this option if you have not received a decision email within 3 working days of applying

Question about the decision on my ETA.label: Question about the decision on my ETA

applicationMethod.label: How did you apply for your ETA?

etaReferenceNumber.label: ETA reference number (optional)
etaReferenceNumber.hint: For example, 2021-1111-1111-1111. We need your ETA reference number to give specific information about your ETA.
